name: Mine Cars - Super Fast Car City Racing Games
name_original: Mine Cars - Super Fast Car City Racing Games
description:
Compete in a crazy sport cars race in urban circuit!

The blocky style in video games is becoming more and more popular and this is the best sports cars racing pixel game!

There is an unwritten rule in the city: the fastest car in the competition will be most respected by his rivals and generate the most envy! That will be your task in the game!

Try to earn an invincible reputation as you showcase your driving skills! Choose between the four available block cars the one you prefer and have fun while you reach the maximum speed!

Do not crash your car frontally because your car race will come to an end! Try to never crash your sport car and maintain your life bar as green as possible! Start increasing your achievements and experience!

Be amazed with the ease of handling the craft cars! Simply tilt your device sideways and tap the screen to increase the speed! Weren't you you looking forward to such an exciting but simple game?

Challenge your family and friends to see who is the fastest in this car racing game! Try to impose your law in the world leaderboards!

Features of this blocky car racing game:

◉ Cityscape!
◉ Beautiful pixelated sport cars!
◉ Easy controls!
◉ Realistic graphics!
◉ High speed!
◉ Leaderboards!
◉ Catchy music!
◉ Free!

Drive to victory and become the most successful of the city! If you think you can achieve it then download this game on your mobile!

We would like you to let us know if you like the game and how we can improve it! Besides, we answer to all the comments!

Is it true that no one can beat you when you get in the car?

-
This is not an official Mojang app. Fernando Baro is not associated or connected with Mojang AB.
Minecraft is a trademark of Mojang AB and it is not endorsed by or affiliated with the creator of this game or its licensors.
